name: AaAhHh!!!!!
description: Had trouble with script execution order so I am a little late here, but this a little game I made for  the GMTK Jam. The perspective switches from top down to side scroller, and the controls switch with it. The goal is simply to survive the swarms of enemies. There are definitely some bugs laying around, but I will hopefully be squashing them soon. If you like the game pls share it or follow (https://twitter.com/Leftover_Games).
